meanings.definition: The act of desorbing or the state of being desorbed.
meanings.sent1: The desorptions of the molecules were carefully studied by the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The desorptions from the surface were unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The desorptions of the paint from the wall created a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The desorptions of secrets from her mind surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The desorptions of the snowflakes from the tree branches was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The process of removing molecules from a surface.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the desorptions is crucial for cleaning surfaces effectively.
meanings.sent2: The desorptions of oil from the water surface were visible.
meanings.sent3: The desorptions of dust from the furniture made the room look cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The desorptions of negativity from her life brought a sense of peace.
meanings.sent5: The desorptions of leaves from the ground signaled the arrival of autumn.

meanings.definition: The release of adsorbed substances from a surface.
meanings.sent1: The desorptions of the chemicals were carefully controlled in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The desorptions of the scents from the air freshener were pleasant.
meanings.sent3: The desorptions of flavors from the food made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: The desorptions of memories from the photo album brought back nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The desorptions of heat from the metal surface were noticeable to the touch.
